problem_text:
Find a non-empty Fitting class F and a non-soluble finite group G such that G has no F-injectors.
L. A. Shemetkov
answer: Found by E. Salomon (Mainz Univ., unpublished); his example is presented in § 7.1 of (A. Ballester-Bolinches, L. M. Ezquerro, Classes of finite groups, Springer, 2006).
